amendment.description: Amendment revises provisions subjecting certain FDIC and NCUA functions to congressional appropriations, relating to appointments of positions created by the Act, and providing congressional access to non-public FSOC information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-163 to revise provisions subjecting certain FDIC and NCUA functions to congressional appropriations, relating to appointments of positions created by the Act, and providing congressional access to non-public FSOC information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 185 (Roll no. 295).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 185 (Roll no. 295).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
